author: Dan Strumpf
title: Who’s Afraid of Huawei? Security Worries Spread Beyond the U.S.
text:
National-security concerns surrounding Chinese telecom giant Huawei Technologies Co. are spreading beyond the U.S. to key allies.
The company was a subject of debate in Canada’s Parliament this week, and the chief executive of South Korea’s largest telecommunications carrier, considering vendors for next-generation wireless equipment, reportedly called Huawei a “concern.”

Australia,...
